name: Wobbuffet BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Right Back at You
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. During your opponent’s next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.

rule_box: Wobbuffet BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
